about_the_game:
An art pack made with love for anyone who considers themselves a Mislight fan!
It contains Mislight's arbook and goodies!

Mislight Artbook

Mislight's official Artbook which includes concept art of the characters, sprites directly from the game, exclusive ones, and different color tests that the artists used during the design process.

Mislight Wallpapers for PC and Mobile

3 wallpapers each for desktop and mobile. Featuring a wallpaper with the art of the amazing artist ちまちゃんさん [Chimachansan] !

Mislight Stickers

A bundle of 32 digital stickers. Print them and paste them all over the place or use them on messaging apps, the possibilities are endless.

Mislight Emoji Set

An emoji set including 32 different emoji of "The Girl". There's no better way to express yourself than this!


*To access the Fan Pack files, after purchasing and downloading the Fan Pack, go into Mislight's Properties menu in your Steam library and click on the "Browse Local Files" button. This will open Mislight's game directory in your File Explorer, you will find the Fan Pack folder and all the files included right there!

name: Mislight Fan Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Any
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: As long as your PC has one that works, you're fine.
